title: The Fiend
content: Level 1 Warlock Spell Slot 1~12 Damage 1d12 Lightning Link yourself to a target with a bolt of lightning. Deal an additional 1~12 Lightning damage each turn by activating it. Inflicts Witch Bolt (10) 18m Concentration Blindness Lvl 2 Necromancy ActionLevel 2 Warlock Spell Slot Limit a foe's sight range. It is easier to hit, and the creature will miss more often.Attack Rolls against it have Advantage and the foe attacks with Disadvantage. 10 turns 18mCON Save CALM EMOTIONS Lvl 2 Enchantment Actio
